trans-unit.source: Defines a region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et område av innhold i utformingen markup for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerRegion object represents a region of content within the design-time markup that is generated by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementation.
trans-unit.target: DesignerRegion-objektet som representerer et område av innhold i utformingen-koder som er generert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>implementering.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A control developer uses designer regions in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementation to define separate areas within the design-time markup for the associated control and to provide editing and event handling for the area.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen utvikler bruker designer områder i en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>implementering til å definere separate områder i utformingen markup for den tilknyttede kontrollen og angi redigering og hendelseshåndtering for området.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], can use designer regions to display the separate areas of a control on the design surface and to raise user events for the region to the control designer.
trans-unit.target: En visuell effekt designer som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], kan bruke designer områder visningsområder en kontroll i utformingsoverflaten egen og bruker hendelser for område til kontrollen utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Designer regions can simplify a control designer implementation because many region-based features are provided by the base designer classes and the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer områder kan forenkle en kontroll designer implementering fordi mange funksjoner for område-baserte leveres av basisklassene designer og den visuelle utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerRegion class provides the base functionality for designer regions, such as the ability to click, select, and highlight a region in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerRegion gir den grunnleggende funksjonaliteten for designer områder, for eksempel muligheten til å klikke, og velg fremheve et område i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Use a DesignerRegion object in a control designer implementation to define a region that does not require editing.
trans-unit.target: Bruk et DesignerRegion-objekt i en kontroll designer implementering til å definere et område som ikke krever redigering.

trans-unit.source: Use the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class in a control designer implementation to define a region with editable content at design time.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den utledede <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>klassen i en kontroll designer implementering til å definere et område med redigerbare innhold på utformingstidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: Use the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> class in a control designer implementation to define an editable region that represents a template in a control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den utledede <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>klassen i en kontroll designer implementering til å definere en redigerbare området som representerer en mal i en kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: To support regions within a class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method and add one or more initialized DesignerRegion objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Støtte dataområder innenfor en klasse som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>metoden og legge til én eller flere initialisert DesignerRegion objektene den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can handle mouse clicks in the regions on the design surface by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt håndtere museklikk i områder på utformingsoverflaten ved å overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the properties of a DesignerRegion object to determine how the region is displayed by the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskaper for en DesignerRegion-objektet til å fastsette hvordan området vises ved den visuelle utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A> property to indicate that the region can be selected by the user on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>egenskap for å angi at området kan velges av brukeren på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A> property to highlight the designer region in the visual designer; for example, you can highlight a region after a user has clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>til å fremheve designer område i den visuelle utformeren; for eksempel kan du utheve et område når en bruker har trykket for å velge det.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> properties to store or retrieve additional details about the region.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>Egenskaper for å lagre eller hente flere detaljer om området.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In particular, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> property is used by the visual designer to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region.
trans-unit.target: Spesielt den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>egenskapen brukes av den visuelle utformeren til å vise verktøytips informasjon når brukeren flytter pekeren over designer område.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A> property to access the methods and properties of the control designer object that contains the designer region.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>til å få tilgang til metoder og egenskaper for kontrollen designer-objektet som inneholder designer område.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> class with the specified name for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet for en kontroll designer.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>|An empty string ("").| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>|The input `designer` object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>|An empty string ("").| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>|The input `name` object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>|`null`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>| En tom streng (""). | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>| Inndataene `designer` objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>| En tom streng (""). | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>| Inndataene `name` objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A>| Et tomt <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary>-objekt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>| `null`.|</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A></xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control designer that contains this designer region.
trans-unit.target: Kontroll-designer som inneholder denne designer område.

trans-unit.source: The name of this designer region.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på dette designer området.

trans-unit.source: designer is .
trans-unit.target: designeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- designer is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - designer er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- name is .
trans-unit.target: -or- name is .

trans-unit.source: -or- name is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - name er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> class with the specified name for a control designer, optionally setting the instance as a selectable region in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet for kontrollen designer eventuelt angi forekomsten som et valgbar område i designer.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>|An empty string ("").| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>|The input `designer` object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>|An empty string ("").| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>|The input `name` object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>|The input `selectable` value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A>|`false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>|`null`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>| En tom streng (""). | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>| Inndataene `designer` objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>| En tom streng (""). | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>| Inndataene `name` objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A>| Et tomt <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary>-objekt. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>| Inndataene `selectable` verdi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A>| `false`.| | <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>| `null`.|</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selected%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A></xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Properties%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.EnsureSize%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control designer that contains this designer region.
trans-unit.target: Kontroll-designer som inneholder denne designer område.

trans-unit.source: The name of this designer region.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på dette designer området.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the region; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge område; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: designer is .
trans-unit.target: designeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- designer is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - designer er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- name is .
trans-unit.target: -or- name is .

trans-unit.source: -or- name is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - eller - name er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir beskrivelsen for et designer område.

trans-unit.source: The Description property is used by the design host to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region.
trans-unit.target: Description-egenskapen brukes av utformingen verten til å vise verktøytips informasjon når brukeren flytter pekeren over designer område.

trans-unit.source: A text description of the designer region.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av designer område.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Defines the HTML attribute name for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Definerer HTML-attributtnavn for et designer område.

trans-unit.source: The attribute name for a designer region is `_designerRegion`.
trans-unit.target: Attributtnavnet for et designer område er `_designerRegion`.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerRegionAttributeName field is used to identify regions within the design-time HTML markup for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Feltet DesignerRegionAttributeName brukes til å identifisere områder i utformingen HTML-koden for kontrollen designer.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the friendly display name for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte visningsnavnet for et designer område.

trans-unit.source: A text display name for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: En tekst visningsnavnet for designer område.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region size is to be explicitly set on the designer region by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om område er angis eksplisitt på området som designer ved utformingen verten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the design host should set the size on the designer region; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, Hvis utformingen verten må angi størrelsen på designer område; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of the designer region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på designer område på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The GetBounds method returns a value that is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.GetBounds%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A> object with this designer region.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetBounds returnerer en verdi som tilsvarer kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.GetBounds%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>objekt med denne designer område.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.GetBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the designer region size on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer designer område størrelsen på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to highlight the designer region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil fremheve designer område på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the visual designer should highlight the designer region on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis den visuelle utformeren skal fremheve designer område på utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer region can be selected by the user on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om designer område kan velges på utformingsoverflaten av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the designer region can be selected by the user on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis det designer området kan velges av brukeren på utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer region is currently selected on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om designer område for øyeblikket er valgt i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the designer region is currently selected on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis designer område er valgt på utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets optional user data to associate with the designer region.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir valgfrie brukerdata å knytte til designer område.

trans-unit.source: Within a control designer implementation, use the UserData property to store or retrieve additional information for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: I en kontroll designer implementering bruke egenskapen vedvarende lagre eller hente tilleggsinformasjon for designer område.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control designer implementation supports selecting from multiple designer regions, you can use the UserData property in a control designer to store a unique index for each region.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen designer implementeringen støtte for å velge fra flere designer områder, kan du for eksempel bruke egenskapen vedvarende i en kontroll designer til å lagre en unik indeks for hver region.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the UserData property for the region that is passed into the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to store the index for the currently selected region.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter bruke vedvarende-egenskapen for området som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metode til å lagre indeksen for det merkede området.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains user data stored for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder brukerdata som er lagret for designer område.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
